document_data.mainbody:
laerns Trail, also called the Wandering Trail, ran through the Vast, connecting the city of Calaunt and the village of Dead Tree Hollow.
From west to east, it began at Calaunt, ran through Thindilar, Sendrin, and Fallentree, and ended at Dead Tree Hollow. On the way, it linked with the Hlintar Ride, the Cross Road, the Long Reach, and Feldars Trail, and ended at the North Road.
